# Coroutine.hpp

This File On Github
Ask A Question

API: latest
module: oatpp
#include "oatpp/core/async/Coroutine.hpp"

# Error

Class to hold and communicate errors between Coroutines

namespace oatpp { namespace async { 
  class Error {}
}}

# Fields

Type Name Summary
const char* message Error message
bool isExceptionThrown Indicates that this error is a result of thrown exception. Re-throw if true to catch original exception.

# Methods

Return Type Name Summary
[none] Error Constructor.

# Error::message

Error message

const char* message

# Error::isExceptionThrown

Indicates that this error is a result of thrown exception. Re-throw if true to catch original exception.

bool isExceptionThrown

# Error::Error

Constructor.

  • @param pMessage - Error message.
  • @param pIsExceptionThrown - Indicate that this error is a result of thrown exception. 

Error(const char* pMessage, bool pIsExceptionThrown = false)

# Action

Class Action represents an asynchronous action.

namespace oatpp { namespace async { 
  class Action {}
}}

# Fields

Type Name Summary
const v_int32 TYPE_COROUTINE Indicate that Action is to start coroutine. Value = 0.
const v_int32 TYPE_YIELD_TO Indicate that Action is to YIELD control to other method of Coroutine. Value = 1.
const v_int32 TYPE_WAIT_RETRY Indicate that Action is to WAIT and then RETRY call to current method of Coroutine. Value = 2.
const v_int32 TYPE_REPEAT Indicate that Action is to REPEAT call to current method of Coroutine. Value = 3.
const v_int32 TYPE_FINISH Indicate that Action is to FINISH current Coroutine and return control to a caller-Coroutine. Value = 4.
const v_int32 TYPE_ABORT Deprecated
const v_int32 TYPE_ERROR Indicate that Error occurred
const Action _WAIT_RETRY Predefined WAIT_RETRY action
const Action _REPEAT Predefined REPEAT action
const Action _FINISH Predefined FINISH action
const Action _ABORT Deprecated

# Methods

Return Type Name Summary
[none] Action Multiple implementations:
  1. Constructor.
  2. Constructor. Construct error reporting action.
bool isError Check if action is an error reporting action.

# Action::TYPE_COROUTINE

Indicate that Action is to start coroutine. Value = 0.

static constexpr const v_int32 TYPE_COROUTINE = 0

# Action::TYPE_YIELD_TO

Indicate that Action is to YIELD control to other method of Coroutine. Value = 1.

static constexpr const v_int32 TYPE_YIELD_TO = 1

# Action::TYPE_WAIT_RETRY

Indicate that Action is to WAIT and then RETRY call to current method of Coroutine. Value = 2.

static constexpr const v_int32 TYPE_WAIT_RETRY = 2

# Action::TYPE_REPEAT

Indicate that Action is to REPEAT call to current method of Coroutine. Value = 3.

static constexpr const v_int32 TYPE_REPEAT = 3

# Action::TYPE_FINISH

Indicate that Action is to FINISH current Coroutine and return control to a caller-Coroutine. Value = 4.

static constexpr const v_int32 TYPE_FINISH = 4

# Action::TYPE_ABORT

Deprecated

static constexpr const v_int32 TYPE_ABORT = 5

# Action::TYPE_ERROR

Indicate that Error occurred

static constexpr const v_int32 TYPE_ERROR = 6

# Action::_WAIT_RETRY

Predefined WAIT_RETRY action

static const Action _WAIT_RETRY

# Action::_REPEAT

Predefined REPEAT action

static const Action _REPEAT

# Action::_FINISH

Predefined FINISH action

static const Action _FINISH

# Action::_ABORT

Deprecated

static const Action _ABORT

# Action::Action

  1. Constructor.
    • @param type - type of the Action.
    • @param coroutine - pointer to a Coroutine to start if type == TYPE_COROUTINE. nullptr otherwise.
    • @param functionPtr - pointer to a function to YIELD control to if type == TYPE_YIELD_TO. nullptr otherwise. 
    Action(v_int32 type, AbstractCoroutine* coroutine, FunctionPtr functionPtr)
  2. Constructor. Construct error reporting action.
    • @param error - Error message. 
    Action(const Error& error)

# Action::isError

Check if action is an error reporting action.

  • @return true if action is an error reporting action. 

bool isError()

# AbstractCoroutine

Abstract Coroutine. Base class for Coroutines. It provides state management, coroutines stack management and error reporting functionality.

namespace oatpp { namespace async { 
  class AbstractCoroutine {}
}}

# Typedefs

Type Name Summary
oatpp::async::Action Action Convenience typedef for Action

# Methods

Return Type Name Summary
Action iterate Make one Coroutine iteration.
[none] ~AbstractCoroutine Virtual Destructor
Action act Entrypoint of Coroutine.
Action call Call function of Coroutine specified by ptr.
void free Internal function. Should free Coroutine on MemoryPool/Bench.
Action handleError Default implementation of handleError(error) function.
Action startCoroutine Start new Coroutine as a "nested" Coroutine, keeping track of a coroutine call stack.
Action startCoroutineForResult Start new Coroutine for result as a "nested" Coroutine, keeping track of a coroutine call stack.
bool finished Check if coroutine is finished
AbstractCoroutine* getParent Get parent coroutine

# AbstractCoroutine::Action

Convenience typedef for Action

typedef oatpp::async::Action Action

# AbstractCoroutine::iterate

Make one Coroutine iteration.

  • @return - control Action. 

Action iterate()

# AbstractCoroutine::~AbstractCoroutine

Virtual Destructor

virtual ~AbstractCoroutine()

# AbstractCoroutine::act

Entrypoint of Coroutine.

  • @return - Action 

virtual Action act() = 0

# AbstractCoroutine::call

Call function of Coroutine specified by ptr.
This method is called from iterate().
Coroutine keeps track of function ptr and calls corresponding function on each iteration. When Coroutine starts, function ptr points to act().

  • @param ptr - pointer of the function to call.
  • @return - Action. 

virtual Action call(FunctionPtr ptr) = 0

# AbstractCoroutine::free

Internal function. Should free Coroutine on MemoryPool/Bench.
Method free() also calls virtual destructor:
Coroutine::free() --> Bench::free(Coroutine* coroutine) { ... coroutine->~Coroutine(); ... }

virtual void free() = 0

# AbstractCoroutine::handleError

Default implementation of handleError(error) function. User may override this function in order to handle errors.

  • @param error - error.
  • @return - Action. If handleError function returns Error, current coroutine will finish, return control to caller coroutine and handleError is called for caller coroutine. 

virtual Action handleError(const Error& error)

# AbstractCoroutine::startCoroutine

Start new Coroutine as a "nested" Coroutine, keeping track of a coroutine call stack.

  • @tparam C - Coroutine to start.
  • @tparam Args - arguments to be passed to a starting coroutine.
  • @param actionOnReturn - Action to be called once new coroutine finished.
  • @param args - actual parameters passed to startCoroutine call.
  • @return - start Coroutine Action. 

template<typename C, typename ... Args>
Action startCoroutine(const Action& actionOnReturn, Args... args)

# AbstractCoroutine::startCoroutineForResult

Start new Coroutine for result as a "nested" Coroutine, keeping track of a coroutine call stack. After Coroutine finished result value should be passed to callback function.
Example call:
startCoroutineForResult<CoroutineWithResult>(MyCoroutine::onResult);

  • @tparam CoroutineType - Coroutine to start.
  • @tparam ParentCoroutineType - calling Coroutine type.
  • @tparam CallbackArgs - callback arguments.
  • @tparam Args - arguments to be passed to a starting coroutine.
  • @param function - Callback to receive result.
  • @param args - actual parameters passed to startCoroutine call.
  • @return - start Coroutine Action. 

template<typename CoroutineType, typename ParentCoroutineType, typename ... CallbackArgs, typename ...Args>
Action startCoroutineForResult(Action (ParentCoroutineType::*function)(CallbackArgs...), Args... args)

# AbstractCoroutine::finished

Check if coroutine is finished

  • @return - true if finished 

bool finished() const

# AbstractCoroutine::getParent

Get parent coroutine

  • @return - pointer to a parent coroutine 

AbstractCoroutine* getParent() const

# Coroutine

Coroutine template.
Example usage:
class MyCoroutine : public oatpp::async::Coroutine<MyCoroutine>

  • @tparam T - child class type 

namespace oatpp { namespace async { 
  template<class T>
  class Coroutine : public AbstractCoroutine {}
}}

# Typedefs

Type Name Summary
oatpp::base::memory::Bench<T> Bench Convenience typedef for Bench

# Methods

Return Type Name Summary
Bench& getBench Get Bench for this Coroutine type.
Action call Call function of Coroutine specified by ptr.
void free Free Coroutine instance.
Action yieldTo Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_YIELD_TO.
const Action& waitRetry Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_WAIT_RETRY.
const Action& repeat Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_REPEAT.
const Action& finish Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_FINISH.
const Action& abort Deprecated.
Action error Convenience method to generate error reporting Action.

# Coroutine::Bench

Convenience typedef for Bench

typedef oatpp::base::memory::Bench<T> Bench

# Coroutine::getBench

Get Bench for this Coroutine type.
Used for system needs. End user should not use it.

  • @return

static Bench& getBench()

# Coroutine::call

Call function of Coroutine specified by ptr.
Overridden AbstractCoroutine::call() method.

  • @param ptr - pointer of the function to call.
  • @return - Action. 

Action call(FunctionPtr ptr) override

# Coroutine::free

Free Coroutine instance. See AbstractCoroutine::free().

void free() override

# Coroutine::yieldTo

Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_YIELD_TO.

  • @param function - pointer to function.
  • @return - yield Action. 

Action yieldTo(Function function) const

# Coroutine::waitRetry

Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_WAIT_RETRY.

  • @return - WAIT_RETRY Action. 

const Action& waitRetry() const

# Coroutine::repeat

Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_REPEAT.

  • @return - repeat Action. 

const Action& repeat() const

# Coroutine::finish

Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_FINISH.

  • @return - finish Action. 

const Action& finish() const

# Coroutine::abort

Deprecated.

  • @return - abort Action. 

const Action& abort() const

# Coroutine::error

Convenience method to generate error reporting Action.

  • @param message - error message.
  • @return - error reporting Action. 

Action error(const char* message)

# CoroutineWithResult

Coroutine with result template.
Example usage:
class CoroutineWithResult : public oatpp::async::CoroutineWithResult<CoroutineWithResult, const char*>

  • @tparam T - child class type.
  • @tparam Args - return argumet type. 

namespace oatpp { namespace async { 
  template<class T, typename ...Args>
  class CoroutineWithResult : public AbstractCoroutine {}
}}

# Methods

Return Type Name Summary
Action call Call function of Coroutine specified by ptr.
void free Free Coroutine instance.
Action yieldTo Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_YIELD_TO.
const Action& waitRetry Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_WAIT_RETRY.
const Action& repeat Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_REPEAT.
const Action& _return Deprecated.
const Action& abort Deprecated.
Action error Convenience method to generate error reporting Action.

# CoroutineWithResult::call

Call function of Coroutine specified by ptr.
Overridden AbstractCoroutine::call() method.

  • @param ptr - pointer of the function to call.
  • @return - Action. 

virtual Action call(FunctionPtr ptr) override

# CoroutineWithResult::free

Free Coroutine instance. See AbstractCoroutine::free().

virtual void free() override

# CoroutineWithResult::yieldTo

Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_YIELD_TO.

  • @param function - pointer to function.
  • @return - yield Action. 

Action yieldTo(Function function) const

# CoroutineWithResult::waitRetry

Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_WAIT_RETRY.

  • @return - WAIT_RETRY Action. 

const Action& waitRetry() const

# CoroutineWithResult::repeat

Convenience method to generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_REPEAT.

  • @return - repeat Action. 

const Action& repeat() const

# CoroutineWithResult::_return

Deprecated.
Call caller's Callback passing returned value, and generate Action of type == Action::TYPE_FINISH.

  • @param args - argumets to be passed to callback.
  • @return - finish Action. 

const Action& _return(Args... args)

# CoroutineWithResult::abort

Deprecated.

  • @return - abort Action. 

const Action& abort() const

# CoroutineWithResult::error

Convenience method to generate error reporting Action.

  • @param message - error message.
  • @return - error reporting Action. 

Action error(const char* message)
